analysis.description:
Reentrancy in FinalizableCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/3/0xcd5c245a7fe35c5b638ac626ca258d33330d1e75.sol#184-194):
	External calls:
	- finalization() (/unique_chucks/3/0xcd5c245a7fe35c5b638ac626ca258d33330d1e75.sol#186-187)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/3/0xcd5c245a7fe35c5b638ac626ca258d33330d1e75.sol#190-194)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0xcd5c245a7fe35c5b638ac626ca258d33330d1e75.sol#86-103) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/3/0xcd5c245a7fe35c5b638ac626ca258d33330d1e75.sol#97-102)

FinalizableCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/3/0xcd5c245a7fe35c5b638ac626ca258d33330d1e75.sol#199-203) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/3/0xcd5c245a7fe35c5b638ac626ca258d33330d1e75.sol#200-201)

RenderTokenCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/3/0xcd5c245a7fe35c5b638ac626ca258d33330d1e75.sol#408-419) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(foundersAddress,foundersTokens) (/unique_chucks/3/0xcd5c245a7fe35c5b638ac626ca258d33330d1e75.sol)
	-token.mint(foundationAddress,foundationTokens) (/unique_chucks/3/0xcd5c245a7fe35c5b638ac626ca258d33330d1e75.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/3/0xcd5c245a7fe35c5b638ac626ca258d33330d1e75.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.13 (/unique_chucks/3/0xcd5c245a7fe35c5b638ac626ca258d33330d1e75.sol#1): it allows old versions
